page.title: 12Community Attitudes Housing
page.content: We have two football pitches one at the bottom of Annitsford welfare and the other next to Dudley fishshop. There is not much to do really because there are hardly any leisure facilities I think we should have some tennis courts. We have quite a few pubs and clubs in our area e.g. Dudley Hotel, Pioneer. I spend some of my time at the jazz band but when I am with Fiona we go to Dudley welfare.If we had some tennis courts we would be be there some nights. By Karen Moor. My community is Annitsford.It is not very good community because there is not much for 10-15 year olds There is a park for 5-9 year olds.There is a youth club but it is only on 2 nights a week, Wednesday and Friday.There are good facilities for the old people There are three old people's homes and lots of bingo.There are a couple of
